definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This is the time when the prophet says, "They shall beat their swords into plowshares ".
sentences.chinese: 这是先知所说的时代，“他们要将刀打成犁头”。

sentences.english: Peace will not come until the swords are beaten into plowshares, and their spears into pruning hooks.
sentences.chinese: 把到打成犁头，把枪打成镰刀，世上才有和平。

sentences.english: The plow with the four-leaf clover symbolizes the luck of the farmer.
sentences.chinese: 犁头和四叶苜蓿象征农夫的好运。

sentences.english: The cut worm forgives the plow.
sentences.chinese: 被犁断的蛀虫原谅犁头。

sentences.english: Watching, he saw two shovel nosed sharks closing in.
sentences.chinese: 他望着海面，看到两条犁头鲨游近来了。

sentences.english: Drive your cart and your plow over the bones of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 大车和犁头的前行碾过死人的白骨。

sentences.english: Though the ploughshare cut through the flowers of life to its fountains.
sentences.chinese: 就算犁头割倒生命之花切断生命之源。

sentences.english: They beat their swords into plowshares.
Sorrow is God's plowshare that turns up and subsoils the depths of the soul, that it may yield richer harvests.
sentences.chinese: 忧愁是神的犁头，掘到土的深处，地就能多结果子。

sentences.english: They will beat their swords into plowshares and their spears into pruning hooks.
sentences.chinese: 他们要将刀打成犁头，把枪打成镰刀。
